name: Torchlight (itch) (AtlasSpills)
description:
Torchlight is a platformer where you're not able to see well. Well, that isn't the complete truth, you ARE able to see, but the thing is, what you use to see isn't always the best tool for the job, as it will destroy platforms and even kill your character on the spot. This is the first game I've made that I haven't followed a bunch of tutorials to make.

I hope you enjoy it

although the last level is hard, it's worth it, I promise :D
